title: Wanted: A Date To Take On A Vacation! Could It Be You?
description:
He broke up with my girlfriend and need somebody to go to Hilton head with me for five days starting October 7th. Can you hook me up? If that goes well, I also have two tickets to Pitbull...and I need somebody for that.
Do you fit what he's looking for and want to go on a trip? Tell us! Email us at producer@thebertshow.com.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
